p:
The pronounced effect of the grain size is observed in Fig. 3a not only for low-density RDX, but also for the density ρ = 1.5 g/cm 3: the dependence σ
max ( τ) is shifted towards the y-axis with the same amplitude values of conductivity. However, it is not possible to single out experiments with small grains for the density ρ > 1.5 g/cm 3 in Fig. 3a. In Fig. 3b, the same results presented in different coordinates are separated according to the grain size.
